paper.title: On the Orbit of the Short-period Exoplanet WASP-19b
paper.authors: Hellier, Coel; Anderson, D. R.; Collier-Cameron, A.; Miller, G. R. M.; Queloz, D.; Smalley, B.; Southworth, J.; Triaud, A. H. M. J.
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal Letters, Volume 730, Issue 2, article id. L31 (2011).
